Forbidden.description: Access token is missing or invalid

Any.description: Any JSON object not defined as schema

path.$ref: #/components/schemas/string // JSON representation of the full hierarchy

category_level.$ref: #/components/schemas/number // Virtual column to store the category level based on the path length

get.summary: Get the authenticated user's bank account details (show)

post.summary: Add bank account details for the authenticated user (store)

text/plain.example: {"serverCode": "USER_BANK_ACCOUNT_CREATE_CONFLICT", "message": "User already has bank account details. Use PUT to update."} or {"serverCode": "USER_BANK_ACCOUNT_BANK_INACTIVE", "message": "Selected bank is not active."} or {"serverCode": "DEFAULT_PAYMENT_METHOD_NOT_FOUND", "message": "Default payment method 'bank_transfer' not configured."}

put.summary: Update the authenticated user's bank account details (update)

Update the authenticated user\'s bank account details.
